mapper.insert:
insert into springboot_user (username, sex, birthday, email, phone, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values
( #{item.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
